messages.msgSnippet: YES!!!!   That was the cutest face ever!   The only reason I scrolled over it was because you had said something about fundoshi in your lil post and I got
messages.messageBody:
YES!!!! That was the cutest face ever! The only reason I scrolled over it was because you had said something about fundoshi in your lil post and I got curious because I didn't see it as one of the options in the cloths lineup. ^.^

BarbaraSheridan <bsher213@...> wrote: Thank you, Bunny, Did you scroll over Kae's fundoshi and see him get
mad? lol The scrolling was a problem. She tried to get it to scroll
frontwards & backwards but it wasn't working.

--
~ Barbara Sheridan

messages.subject: Re: Dress the Samurai
messages.msgSnippet: Bunny, You have to see Anne Cain s (http://www.dragonsdisciple.com) drawing of Kaemon Nakagawanomiya over at http://www.chloemichelle.com , either as a chibi
messages.messageBody:
Bunny,

You have to see Anne Cain's (http://www.dragonsdisciple.com) drawing
of Kaemon Nakagawanomiya over at http://www.chloemichelle.com ,
either as a chibi or in full fledged art form he is very adorable
(^_^).

I really support a fanfic crossover between Peacemaker Kurogane and
Mirror,Mirror
http://mardigraspublishing.com/mirrormirror.html
(Amazon release 7/7) just because in my mind Emmie would beat the
crap out of Tetsu (LOL!) then again Emmie and Tetsu have some things
in common too.

Wait my pretties...soon SHQ will be fantabulous...

both me and the programmer working on SHQ have been really busy
lately but rest assured you all will be very very happy with the new
functions.

People who would like to submit fanart, photos, fanmade vids,
reports, book or movie reviews please continue to do so...updates
will resume once the new site if fully functional...(and yes I know I
said it would be done earlier) but amhosting (the server for SHQ)
actually CHARGES us if we ask questions as to why certain things we
install do not work. We email a question, they decline to help
(*_*)...it really sucks...

It's not always the matter of if the programmer can accomplish
certain tasks but the whether or not the server at its current status
even allows us to do so....moving SHQ to let's say GEOCITIES would be
very expensive due to the enormous amount of files and bandwidth
needed (geocities is waaaay more expensive).

So to prevent higher expenses the programmer just sits there and
figures things out on her own and we test things out on the
server...hence the delays, the angst and many late nights (T_T).

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Dress the Samurai
messages.msgSnippet: That is incredibly cute!   I loves it!!!   And that lil fundoshi ^.^   This is hours of fun and cuteness for me! Mmm, may I suggest something that might
messages.messageBody:
That is incredibly cute! I loves it!!! And that lil fundoshi ^.^ This is hours of fun and cuteness for me!

Mmm, may I suggest something that might improve your daughter's work? If she can make it so that somehow you can scroll the clothes. I found it a bit difficult to scroll for his handsome attire.

bsher213 <bsher213@...> wrote: My daughter made a flash video game with a chibi version of the
character from my book featuring the Shinsengumi

Play Dress (and undress) the Kae (complete with cute fundoshi)!
http://img253.imageshack.us/my.php?image=kaemondressupcm1.swf&width=800

Barb Sheridan
http://www.chloemichelle.com
